ISIQALO:

UMGANGATHO:

Liyaqhubekeka


INKCAZELO:


Inkqubo yocalucalulo yayiyilwe ngendlela eqinisekisa ukuba abo bahlelelekileyo nabakwangabasebenzi bahlala kwezona ndawo zakha zakude kwiindawo zokusebenza. Abantu abaninzi ke ngoko bathembele kwizithuthi zikawonkewonke.

URhulumente wePhondo uqulunqe isicwangciso-qhinga sokuvuselela inkqubo yezothutho ezisetyenziswa nguwonkewonke waza waqwalasela iingxaki ezithile ezidalwe zezi zibonelelo zikhayo kungoku nje.

Isigaba sokuqala sale projekthi inkulu kangaka iya kuba kukwazisa ngenkqubo ekuthiwa yi-rapid bus transit (RBT) engasekwirhange yase Klipfontein.
Oku kubandakanya indlela esuka eKhayelitsha isiya eMowbray, apho kukho nendlela yebhayisekile neyabahambi ngeenyawo ethe yaphuculwa. Kulindeleke into yokuba ukuphuhliswa kweKlipfontein Road ibe yipaseji yezithuthi kungazala izinto eziluncedo kwezoshishini, uluntu nakubaqhubi bezithuthi zoluntu.
Le projekthi lilinge elidityanelweyo liSebe lezoThutho neMisebenzi yakwaRhulumente kunye neSixeko saseKapa.

Funda nangakumbi ngenkqubo ekhawulezayo yothutho ngeebhasi:

Cape Town studies rapid bus scheme



UHLAHLO LWABIWO-MALI:

R300-yezigidi
